name: ZombSlash AR
description:
ZombSlash AR is an Augmented Reality game horror action game.

As you walk, Zombies and Bats will appear randomly in the real world with weather effects such as snow and rain. Or else turn on Instant Play to spawn Zombies or Bats manually wherever you wish.

Zombies move quickly and attack from various directions going often out of your sight so keep an eye.

Slash Zombies with 11 weapons among them are royal ancient weapon like the Gurj or slash them with the classic Sword. Earn ZombSlash Cash via slashing Zombies to purchase stuff at the ZombSlash SHOP.


Important:
- Random Zombie spawning requires Motion Usage permission.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Information current as of June, 2019.
- Not compatible with devices which does not support Apple's ARKit.
- Please visit http://zombslash.maxmatch.co for information on compatibility, terms of service and privacy policy.

Credits: Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
